PageResource1.Title: North Pole 2006
TextExpeditionHeaderResource1.Text: Unsupported expedition to the North Pole
TextExpeditionResource1.Text: Airborne Ranger Club of Finland's expedition skied from Canadas Ward Hunt to the geographic North Pole during spring 2006. Expedition consisted of seven skiing expedition members, and a large group of support members...
